overview: This documentary visits Yildiz Sinema, which operated from 1953 to 1988 and which currently serves as an astro pitch in its old and tired building. The director and the old workers of the cinema wander among the dusty remnants of the building, which insistently reminds that it is actually a cinema building. They attempt to infuse Yildiz Cinema with life again through memories of the old workers.
title: Stardust
